mapper.insert: insert into generic(id, name, description, uploaded_pretty, uploaded, data_id, course_id, game_style_name, game_style, theme_name, theme, difficulty_name, difficulty, world_record_pretty, world_record, upload_time_pretty, upload_time, num_comments, clear_condition, clear_condition_name, clear_condition_magnitude, clears, attempts, clear_rate, plays, versus_matches, coop_matches, likes, boos, unique_players_and_versus, weekly_likes, weekly_plays) values (userName, danmu, createTime, name, description, uploadedPretty, uploaded, courseId, gameStyleName, gameStyle, themeName, theme, difficultyName, difficulty, worldRecordPretty, worldRecord, uploadTimePretty, uploadTime, numComments, clearCondition, clearConditionMagnitude, clears, attempts, clearRate, plays, versusMatches, coopMatches, likes, boos, uniquePlayersAndVersus, weeklyLikes, weeklyPlays,)
